title: A Christmas Carol - Part 1 (ASMR Holiday Special)
description: Welcome to Part 1 of Sleep and Relax ASMR's Holiday Special Series! This episode, the wonderful Lori, a fan and listener of the show, reads several chapters of Charles Dickens classic, "A Christmas Carol." Thanks again to Lori for the amazing audio! Thanks to Taylor, Chris, Beth, Philip, Lori, and Heide for supporting the show (https://www.patreon.com/sleepandrelaxasmr) Website: www.SleepandRelaxASMR.com Email: Hello@SleepandRelaxASMR.com --- This episode is sponsored by · Anchor: The easiest way to make a podcast. https://anchor.fm/app --- Send in a voice message: https://anchor.fm/sleepandrelaxasmr/message Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/sleepandrelaxasmr/support
